Detailed Description

MPEG2 program stream encoder with IPMPX signalling.

MPEG2 program stream encoder is used by DRM encoder for adding DRM information to MPEG2 program stream.

Member Function Documentation

bool DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXPStreamEncoder::CreateInterIPMPControlInfoPart (  IInterPStreamIPMPControlInfoPart **  interPart  )  [virtual]
 

MPEG2 program stream encoder with IPMPX signalling.Create new intermediate part of the IPMP control information structure.

The newly created intermediate part is the intermediate part in a row of parts constituting an IPMP control information structure. DRM encoder must take care of the correct indexing and calling of this and corresponding IPMP control information parts creating functions.

Parameters:
interPart output, newly created intermediate part pointer (if successful).
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Implements DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IMPEG2IPMPXPStreamEncoder.

Create new last part of the IPMP control information structure.

The newly created last part is the last part in a row of parts constituting an IPMP control information structure. DRM encoder must take care of the correct indexing and calling of this and corresponding IPMP control information parts creating functions.

Parameters:
lastPart output, newly created last part pointer (if successful).
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

const std::string &  out,
IXMLElement *  xml,
EncMethod  method
) 
 

Encode file.

Encoding order is: intermediate control info parts, last conrol info part, IPMP descriptor.

Parameters:
in input, name of the input file.
out input, name of the output file.
xml input-output, XML document containing necessary information for protecting content.
method input, encryption method.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
